Little Girl Was Found Wrapped in Saran Wrap Inside Suitcase. Now Both Mom and Boyfriend Face Charges
In a heart-wrenching and disturbing case out of Maryland, three-year-old Nola Dinkins' life was tragically cut short, and her remains were discovered in a suitcase wrapped in Saran Wrap. Authorities are now pursuing murder charges against her mother, Darrian Randle, and her boyfriend, Cedrick Antoine Britten.

Dianna Carney
Local Habitat for Humanity ReStore Closes Doors After 10-Years
Old Colony Habitat for Humanity's ReStore in Attleboro has permanently closed its doors after serving the community for ten years, the organization announced this week. The ReStore operated on a model that benefited both the environment and affordable housing, accepting new and gently used items that might otherwise end up in landfills and selling them at significant discounts. All proceeds directly funded Old Colony Habitat's home building projects, which provide affordable housing to families in need.
Attleboro, MA ·24d

World’s largest paper company to close California facility, laying off 71 employees
CALIFORNIA – International Paper notified the California Employment Development Department (EDD) that it would be laying off 71 employees. The company is closing its container facility in Buena Park as part of broader consolidations that have affected roughly 2,500 employees across the United States.

CA woman sues major food brand for selling half empty snack bags
CALIFORNIA – A California woman filed a class action lawsuit against PepsiCo, alleging its Popcorners are sold in oversized bags that are more than half empty. Plaintiff Bonnie Reyes purchased a bag of PepsiCo’s 7-ounce Sea Salt Popcorners in 2025 for $4.79.

Meet The 13lb Little Dog Who Loves Being Carried Like a Baby Now Searching for Love
Great Dog Rescue New England, a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, would like you to meet Hank, a charming 4-year-old Boston Terrier mix seeking his forever home. Though we aren't sure what the beginning of his life looked like, at some point, Hank found himself in need of rescuing. Luckily for him, Great Dog Rescue New England was there to bring him into their care, and set him up with a loving foster home where he can live safely until the next chapter of his life begins.

Meet The Two Bonded Shih Tzu Mixes Who Are Searching For Love Together
Great Dog Rescue New England (GDRNE), a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, would like you to meet Sam and Gabby, a bonded pair of Shih Tzu mixes who have spent their entire lives together. According to the rescue, “Sam and Gabby had an owner that loved them, and it shows.” The reason for these two ending up in rescue care was not provided, but one thing is clear: They need a home where they can remain together. Now living with a loving foster family, these inseparable companions are ready to enter the next part of their lives together.

The Southern Peach Dessert You’ll Be Making All Summer
Peach season is basically the South’s version of a holiday—and this easy peach and pecan sandy crumble is the dessert that shows up to celebrate. It’s got all the juicy, sweet goodness of a cobbler but with a buttery cookie-like topping that’s packed with pecans. It’s casual enough for a weeknight and crowd-pleasing enough for cookouts and potlucks. Best part? No need to roll out dough or fuss with pie crust.

Local Dog Rescue Reveals They're in Need of More Foster Homes to Help Save Lives
A dedicated rescue in New England is looking for dog lovers with room in their hearts and homes to help them save furry friends who are in need of a second chance at life. Massachusetts-based Sandy Paws Rescue Inc., a licensed 501(c)(3) nonprofit dog rescue, has issued an urgent call for foster homes for dogs who are in need of a place to call home until their forever family finds them.
Westport, MA ·29d
 · user · 33.4K followers
Dianna Carney
Meet Cutie: The Little 10lb "Chiweenie" Searching For Love
Great Dog Rescue New England (GDRNE), a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, would like you to meet Cutie, a tiny 3-year-old Chihuahua and Dachshund mix pup who is ready and waiting to meet her forever family. Until recently, this small girl was living on her own as a stray in Tennessee, just trying to find enough food each day. “She was wandering alone down a dark street one night,” says GDRNE when describing how Cutie came into their care. “We aren't sure what her story is, but we are happy we found her when we did and hopefully can help her write her next chapter with a loving family!” Now living in the safety of a caring foster home, Cutie has since been thriving.
 · user · 33.4K followers
Dianna Carney
Time is Running Out for This Massachusetts Rescue Dog Who Urgently Needs a Foster Home by Friday
A four-year-old mixed-breed dog named Mozart faces the possibility of being sent back to Texas unless a home for him is found by Friday, July 18th. Sandy Paws Rescue Inc., a foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, issued the urgent appeal after Mozart's recent adoption fell through. “Mozart was adopted in May but is too strong for his adopter. She wants him out ASAP but we have no where for him to go! He is available for foster-to-adopt with a completed adoption application. Or a foster-only home would work too,” explains the nonprofit rescue.
 · user · 18.1K followers

Meth, Mayhem, and the Magical Mystery Tour! Florida Man Strikes Again!
Florida—the only state where the line between “news” and “Mad Libs” has been permanently blurred. So let’s talk about Jonathan Patrick Winslow, a Florida man who rang in his 57th birthday not with cake or candles, but by stealing a Conch Tour Train in Key West… on the Fourth of July. Because why not combine America’s birthday and your own in a festive meth-fueled parade of poor decisions?

Local Shelter Introduces "The Cutest Puppy to Grace the Internet Today"
The Scituate Animal Shelter of Massachusetts recently introduced Bubblegum, a three-month-old puppy with an irresistible charm that has already begun capturing hearts but has not yet found her future family. With her scruffy fur, Chihuahua-like features, and stubby legs, this unique pup has become the shelter's latest dog on a quest to find her a forever home.

Local Rescue Shares Puppy Who Was Found as a Stray Living in a Tree
Great Dog Rescue New England (GDRNE), a dedicated foster-based dog rescue in Massachusetts, would like you to meet Crazy Hair Harry, a remarkable 9-week-old puppy came into rescue after being found in a very unlikely spot. “This scruffy boy was found as a stray in Mississippi and was found in a dead tree trunk where he had been living and struggling to survive,” reports GDRNE. “He was so scared at first, and we are so lucky we found him when we did!” Now living safely in foster care, Harry no longer needs to struggle or be afraid, and he has been thriving.
